net.jmatrix.eproperties.cli
Class ArgParser

java.lang.Object
  net.jmatrix.eproperties.cli.ArgParser

public class ArgParser
extends Object

Simple class for parsing command line arguments out of an argument list.

The arguments can be switches (boolean), or Strings. For string arguments, either of the following 2 formats is valid:
-cargVal or
-c argVal

For either of these 2 cases, a call go getStringArg("-c") will return argVal.

Author:
Paul Bemowski
